body:
What are you guys giving to your family and friends?

I'm going to give my Mom some Starbucks coffee grinds and my sister a gift card.

For one of my friends, I'm giving them a mousepad.

Comment below!

title: What are you giving for Christmas?

replies.body:
A 90cm inflatable penis.

I'm not joking.
replies.body_tagged:

I'm not joking.

replies.body:
Last year my friend and I gave each other gifts, but we aren't doing it this year because we barely even talk. He really wanted this book, so I bought him the book and gave it to him.

This year I bought my mom 2 Under Armour Jackets, 2 sweat pants, and a pair of shoes, because she always uses the same gym clothes ;-;.
